title: Unusual Ping Spike on Riot's IP
body:
Hi,

A few days ago this unusual high lag and ping started, so I checked out where I am getting this latency from and it turns out the trace route results shows that Riot's serving is causing problems for me. Can you please look into it ? I am pasting my trace route result.


  3     2 ms     4 ms     2 ms  broadband.actcorp.in [202.83.26.1]
  4     2 ms     2 ms     2 ms  14.141.145.5.static-Bangalore.vsnl.net.in [14.141.145.5]
  5    21 ms    21 ms    21 ms  172.31.47.5
  6    20 ms    20 ms    20 ms  ix-ae-0-4.tcore2.MLV-Mumbai.as6453.net [180.87.39.25]
  7   135 ms   134 ms   135 ms  if-ae-2-2.tcore1.MLV-Mumbai.as6453.net [180.87.38.1]
  8   137 ms   137 ms   137 ms  if-ae-5-2.tcore1.WYN-Marseille.as6453.net [80.231.217.29]
  9   136 ms   136 ms   136 ms  if-ae-8-1600.tcore1.PYE-Paris.as6453.net [80.231.217.6]
 10   135 ms   133 ms   133 ms  if-ae-11-2.tcore1.PVU-Paris.as6453.net [80.231.153.49]
 11   138 ms   138 ms   138 ms  80.231.153.66
 12     *        *        *     Request timed out.
 13   222 ms   229 ms   224 ms  4.16.252.202
 14   208 ms   208 ms   208 ms  104.160.137.35
 **15   605 ms   602 ms   596 ms  ae35-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.26]**
 16   234 ms   238 ms   247 ms  104.160.131.1

Trace complete.

You will notice that                15   605 ms   602 ms   596 ms  ae35-br01.chi01.riotdirect.net [104.160.159.26]

Here I am getting a very sharp spike and it seems to be the riot server. Please help me out with this.

Thank you.

replies.body:
This trace gives us some basic information, but there are a lot of details missing. I recommend running another traceroute using [**WinMTR.**](http://winmtr.net/) After loading up the app, toss **104.160.131.1** into the host field and run a trace for 5 minutes. After 5 minutes has gone by, export your results as text and paste them in a reply.

If you run into any issues with this, please let me know.
